headline: Donald Trump: Nancy Mace Is Nasty, Disloyal, and Bad for the Republican Party'
author: Hannah Bleau
sentences:
Two years ago, she begged for my endorsement and then she pledged to be America First.?
However, Trump said, Mace went to D.C., where she started attacking Republicans and [held] a fundraiser for wacky Liz Cheney.? Yet, Mace has attempted to position herself as one of Trump's earliest supporters but has yet to explain why she believes Trump chose to endorse her primary challenger, Katie Arrington, instead.

Katie Arrington, on the other hand, is liked and respected and a true Republican,? he declared, continuing to blast Mace:
As Breitbart News detailed:
As Breitbart News previously chronicled, Katie Arrington won the nomination during the 2018 midterm elections when she defeated Rep. Mark Sanford (R-SC) with the former president's endorsement.

Katie Arrington is running against an absolutely terrible candidate, Congresswoman Nancy Mace, whose remarks and attitude have been devastating for her community and not at all representative of the Republican Party to which she has been very disloyal,? Trump said during the Florence rally.

Former President Donald Trump called out terrible? Rep. Nancy Mace (R-SC) on Thursday, deeming her nasty, disloyal, and bad for the Republican Party.?
Fox News is putting on the terrible Nancy Mace of South Carolina at every opportunity they get.

Katie Arrington has my Complete and Total Endorsement!? he emphasized:
This is far from the first time Trump has warned about the dangers of voters reelecting Rep. Mace.
Unfortunately, events did not unfold as she had planned when she was a passenger in a deadly car crash that relegated her to a wheelchair for the rest of the campaign.
In the first congressional district, you have another horrendous RINO known as crazy Nancy Mace,? Trump said during his March 12 rally in Florence, South Carolina.
A recent survey for Arrington's campaign suggested that Mace's lead deteriorates once voters learn that Trump endorsed Arrington.
Her opponent, Katie Arrington, is wonderful and will do a much better job for both South Carolina and the Republican Party.
Notably, every candidate Trump endorsed in Texas's Republican primaries won or went on to a runoff.
You'll need to ask him,? she told the State when asked about Trump's refusal to endorse her.
Paul Ryan is pushing her so hard it's ridiculous,? Trump said in a scathing statement.
She's nasty, disloyal, and bad for the Republican Party.
